question: The 3rd edition of the Annual 5G India Congress 2018 will be held in __________.
explanation: The 3rd edition of the Annual 5G India Congress 2018 will be held on April 20 in New Delhi. 5G Indian Congress 2018 will focus more on understanding and analysing current Network infrastructure and its developments, 5G market condition and requirements. The Indian Government has plans to roll out 5G by 2020. 5G will enable individuals, govts & companies to remain in sync in real time.
